name: Production Rate Monitor Plus
desc: Monitors the production rate of any craft and estimates your points and profit per hour.

name: Auto-Complete Construction Objects
desc: Simulates a click whenever a new object's construction requirements are met.

name: Toggle Objects (Gasoline/Petroleum Switch)
desc: Turn objects on and off to control production rates. For example, automatically switch between gasoline and petroleum production.

name: Settings GUI
desc: Manage all of your installed scripts with an in-game user interface. No more refreshing to update scripts!

name: Auto Sell (free!)
desc: Just the default autosell script, except this one works with our Settings GUI script. Yours for free!
